p: The chemical composition of the two feeding substrates is reported in Table 1. Fresh mulberry leavesâ€™ moisture content was 67.8%, against 73.2% of the diet. The two feeding substrates had similar crude fat contents, while they were statistically different in the total protein and total free sugar amount, as Florio leaves contained almost 40% less crude protein and twice as much sugar content than the artificial diet.
